footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kuki Shinobu | Update Date: 02/28/2023 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Cutter__ The high Crit Rate substat and HP% passive makes it the best choice for Kuki's personal damage.

__Favonius Sword__ Favonius' high ER negates the need to build any ER on Kuki and allows her to focus on more offensive stats while also helping the rest of the team with its clear particles.

__Key of Khaj-Nisut__ HP% substat boosts Kuki's healing. The passive can not be activated on the first rotation but it's long duration means it can be procced in subsequent ones which would boost the teams EM greatly. Much more reliable with C4

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Lion's Roar__ The ATK% isn't very useful for Kuki. However, the DMG% bonus is very valuable in teams that can have high uptime on it. The passive is not reliable with teams that have Nahida in them because of her high Dendro Application.

__ Festering Desire__ ER substat helps alleviate ER reqs and also boosts Skill DMG% with its passive.

__ Iron Sting__ Craftable sword with EM substat and DMG% passive make it a good option for Kuki.

Other Weapons: Mistsplitter Reforged, Light of Foliar Incision, Haran Geppaku Futsu, Freedom Sworn, Toukabou Shigure, Dark Iron Sword
